brandEssence.positioning: We deliver personalized, everyday health solutions that support vitality at any life stage

toneOfVoice.description: Warm, supportive, and knowledgeable without being clinical or condescending

logo.description: One A Day wordmark with distinctive styling

rules.name: Logo Presence
rules.requirement: One A Day logo must be present on all brand materials

rules.name: Logo Integrity
rules.requirement: Logo must not be stretched, distorted, rotated, or modified in any way

rules.name: Minimum Size - Digital
rules.requirement: Logo must be at least 120px wide for digital applications

rules.name: Minimum Size - Print
rules.requirement: Logo must be at least 1 inch (25.4mm) wide for print applications

rules.name: Clear Space
rules.requirement: Maintain minimum clear space equal to the height of the 'O' in One around all sides of the logo

rules.name: Approved Color Versions
rules.requirement: Use only approved logo color versions: full color, white (reversed), or black

rules.name: Background Contrast
rules.requirement: Logo must have sufficient contrast against background - use reversed logo on dark backgrounds

rules.name: No Effects
rules.requirement: Do not apply shadows, glows, gradients, or other effects to the logo

prohibitions: Do not stretch or distort the logo
Do not change logo colors outside approved versions
Do not add shadows, glows, or effects
Do not place logo on busy or low-contrast backgrounds
Do not crop or partially obscure the logo

colors.description: One A Day color palette - vibrant, energetic, and health-focused

rules.name: Approved Palette Only
rules.requirement: Only use colors from the approved One A Day color palette

rules.name: Primary Color Dominance
rules.requirement: OAD Orange (#FF6600) should be the dominant brand color in key brand moments

rules.name: Color Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Follow color hierarchy: Primary (60%), Secondary (30%), Accent (10%)

rules.name: Color Accuracy
rules.requirement: Colors must match exact hex/RGB values within tolerance of 5 units

rules.name: Prohibited Colors
rules.requirement: Do not use colors that conflict with brand identity or competitor colors

primary.name: OAD Orange
primary.usage: Primary brand color, CTAs, key highlights, packaging accent

secondary.name: Deep Navy
secondary.usage: Headlines, body text on light backgrounds, premium feel

accent.name: Vitality Green
accent.usage: Health indicators, success states, natural/wellness messaging

functional.name: Error Red
functional.usage: Error messages only - never as decorative color

prohibitedColors.reason: Pure red reserved for errors only

typography.description: Clean, modern, highly legible typography system

rules.name: Primary Font Family
rules.requirement: Use approved font families only: Proxima Nova (preferred) or fallbacks

rules.name: Font Weights
rules.requirement: Use only approved font weights: Light (300), Regular (400), Semibold (600), Bold (700)

rules.name: Minimum Body Text Size
rules.requirement: Body text must be at least 16px for digital, 10pt for print

rules.name: Minimum Caption Size
rules.requirement: No text smaller than 12px for digital, 8pt for print

rules.name: Heading Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Headings must follow clear size hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3 > H4)

rules.name: Line Height
rules.requirement: Body text line height should be 1.4-1.6 for optimal readability

rules.name: Line Length
rules.requirement: Body text line length should be 50-75 characters for optimal readability

rules.name: Text Alignment
rules.requirement: Use left-aligned text for body copy; centered for headlines only when appropriate

accessibility.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance is mandatory for all One A Day materials

rules.name: Normal Text Contrast
rules.requirement: Normal text (<18px or <14px bold) must have minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio

rules.name: Large Text Contrast
rules.requirement: Large text (≥18px or ≥14px bold) must have minimum 3:1 contrast ratio

rules.name: UI Component Contrast
rules.requirement: Interactive UI components must have minimum 3:1 contrast against adjacent colors

rules.name: Minimum Text Size
rules.requirement: No text smaller than 12px (16px preferred for body)

rules.name: Color Independence
rules.requirement: Information must not be conveyed by color alone - use icons, patterns, or text labels

rules.name: Touch Target Size
rules.requirement: Interactive elements must have minimum 44x44px touch target

rules.name: Focus Indicators
rules.requirement: All interactive elements must have visible focus indicators

rules.name: Image Alt Text
rules.requirement: All meaningful images must have descriptive alt text

imagery.description: Photography and imagery that reflects vitality, authenticity, and wellness

rules.name: Image Quality
rules.requirement: Images must be high resolution - minimum 72dpi for web, 300dpi for print

rules.name: Authentic Representation
rules.requirement: Use authentic, diverse imagery showing real people in natural settings

rules.name: Brand Tone Alignment
rules.requirement: Imagery should feel optimistic, warm, healthy, and empowering

rules.name: Lighting Quality
rules.requirement: Use natural, warm lighting - avoid harsh shadows or clinical lighting

rules.name: Diversity & Inclusion
rules.requirement: Imagery must represent diverse ages, ethnicities, body types, and abilities

rules.name: Product Photography
rules.requirement: Product shots should be clean, well-lit, and show accurate colors

style.lighting: Natural daylight or warm artificial light
style.subjects: Real people (not overly polished models), everyday wellness moments

principles: Use rule of thirds for dynamic compositions
Leave space for text overlay when needed
Focus on genuine moments and expressions

layout.description: Consistent layout principles for brand cohesion

rules.name: Logo Placement
rules.requirement: Logo should be in top-left corner or bottom-right for most applications

rules.name: Grid System
rules.requirement: Use 8px base grid for all spacing and alignment

rules.name: Visual Hierarchy
rules.requirement: Establish clear visual hierarchy with size, weight, and color

rules.name: Whitespace
rules.requirement: Maintain generous whitespace - designs should breathe, not feel cramped

rules.name: CTA Prominence
rules.requirement: Call-to-action must be clearly visible and prominent

rules.name: Content Margins
rules.requirement: Maintain minimum 16px margins on mobile, 24px on desktop

keyMessages: Personalized nutrition for your life stage

rules.name: Brand Voice Consistency
rules.requirement: All copy should reflect empowering, approachable, and trustworthy tone

rules.name: Claim Substantiation
rules.requirement: All health claims must be substantiated and compliant with regulations

rules.name: Required Disclaimers
rules.requirement: Include required FDA/legal disclaimers where applicable
